headline: Truist Stays Neutral on Analog Devices (ADI) Amid Strong Auto and AI Growth
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is included among the 14 Best US Stocks to Buy for Long Term. On November 26, Truist analyst William Stein increased the price target for Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) from $249 to $258 and kept a Hold rating on the stock. The analyst noted in the research note that the company […]
